Package ohos.nfc.tag

Class TagInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.nfc.tag.TagInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public class TagInfo
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Provides tag information.

    This class provides the technology a tag supports, for example, NFC-A. Applications can create different tags based on the supported technology.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Communication#NFC
